class.summary: Base class for implementing calculations and hold the calculation context.

remarks.para: It is a main entry point that provides all tracing capabilities and holds all the required state during calculation execution. When inherited, the derived class can also provide an interface to pass in all needed calculation inputs, it can also contain all required constants.
